summary:
I have completed **Phase 3** of the Solar Panel Calculator implementation. Here's what was accomplished:

## Summary

### Commits Made
1. `f1a34d9` - feat(solar): add SolarCalculator Livewire component with UI
2. `f387dd4` - autoclaude(solar-panel-calculator): complete Phase 3

### Files Created
- `laravel/app/Livewire/SolarCalculator.php` - Livewire component with address autocomplete, system size slider, shading selection, and results display
- `laravel/resources/views/livewire/solar-calculator.blade.php` - Blade template with Finnish UI, monthly bar chart, and styled results section
- `laravel/tests/Feature/SolarCalculatorLivewireTest.php` - 11 tests covering component functionality

### Files Modified
- `laravel/routes/web.php` - Added `/aurinkopaneelit` route

### Features Implemented
- Address autocomplete using Digitransit geocoding service (with 300ms debounce)
- System size slider (1-20 kWp, default 5)
- Shading level selection (none/some/heavy) with visual icons
- Results dis
